issue.title: Deploy TC to the Play Store
issue.body:
Translation Cards is no longer available on the Play Store. Look into why this has happened and re-deploy the app.

Add @IzzySoft [F-Droid compatible repo](https://apt.izzysoft.de/fdroid/index/apk/org.mercycorps.translationcards) to list of where to get Translation Cards.

issue.title: Not able to import deck with file name with.zip (Austin.s.Test.Deck.zip)
issue.body:
1. Try to import a deck with file name Austin.s.Test.Deck.2.zip (https://github.com/translation-cards/translation-cards/files/493640/Austin.s.Test.Deck.2.zip)
2. Observed that not able to import the file named *.zip.
   (this file is referred in the issue #297)

issue.title: Write End-to-End Tests That Cover Minimal Functionality
issue.body:
In order to improve our testing strategy we need to have an end-to-end test that covers the minimal functionality that has to work in order for us to be able to deploy safely.

To achieve this, we will take the following steps:
- [x] 1. Determine minimal functionality needed for safe deploy
- [x] 2. Design an end-to-end test that covers the minimal functionality
- [x] 3. Pick a framework to implement the end-to-end test
- [ ] 4. Write a simple end-to-end test and get it running on an emulator
- [ ] 5. Extend the end-to-end test to cover the minimal functionality

issue.title: Have the ability to run the Appium functional tests locally and through the pipeline
issue.body: Currently the Appium tests are set up to run through the pipeline.  It would be useful to have a feature that would allow the user to toggle between running the tests locally or from the pipeline.

issue.title: Appium Tests:  Unable to find the element id for the record button
issue.body: For the create deck workflow, Appium is unable to locate the record button by id.

issue.title: #280 Expands functional tests for basic card and deck creation flows

issue.title: #301 change file MIME type for import deck dialog
issue.body: This change allows the user to choose any file from the file selection dialog. This means the user can select decks packaged with a .txc or a .zip extension.

issue.title: MyDecksActivity to MVP pattern
Extract next button into view class
issue.body: Currently we do a lot of redundant styling around the next button. Extract this view logic into a view class.
